str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To veil, hide, conceal, envelop. Akin to klepto and krupto; to cover up.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To veil, hide, conceal, envelop. Akin to klepto and krupto; to cover up.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
